Description:
Formulate detailed technical recruiting documents for sourcing and analytical purposes.
Portray good command of concise planning to meet the company's recruitment demands.
Establish a sound sourcing and recruitment plan to funnel high-skilled individuals for required vacancies.
Implement a successful end-to-end recruitment cycle covering all crucial aspects of the profile requirements and company culture.
Upload clear and concise work requirements on various offline and online platforms.
Research different recruitment models and develop descriptions for attracting suitable talent.Skills
Skills:
Demonstrated ability to brainstorm ideas with the in-house team through fluent meetings and discussions.
Portraying sound knowledge of the recruitment cycle through streamlined thinking and clear decision-making.
Depicting excellent command over meeting the dynamics of workspace.
Experienced end-to-end recruiter with sound command over conventional and digital hiring techniques.
Solid ability to conduct different types of interviews
Bachelor Degree in HR or any related field.
